Referentials.Referential:
PARENTLST PARENTLST ACTOR 3 false false false
*
select ar.IDA as FK, ar.IDROLEACTOR, a.* from dbo.ACTOR a inner join dbo.ACTORROLE ar on ar.IDA_ACTOR=a.IDA
BROKER ar IDROLEACTOR string = BROKER inner join dbo.ACTORROLE ar on(ar.IDA=tblmain.IDA)
COUNTERPARTY ar IDROLEACTOR string = COUNTERPARTY inner join dbo.ACTORROLE ar on(ar.IDA=tblmain.IDA)
CSS ar IDROLEACTOR string = CSS inner join dbo.ACTORROLE ar on(ar.IDA=tblmain.IDA)
COUNTERPARTY_CSS|CLEARER ar IDROLEACTOR string = COUNTERPARTY
inner join dbo.ACTORROLE ar on (ar.IDA=tblmain.IDA) inner join dbo.ACTORROLE ar_c on ((ar_c.IDA=tblmain.IDA) and ((ar_c.IDROLEACTOR = 'CSS') or (ar_c.IDROLEACTOR = 'CLEARER')))
ACCOUNTSERVICER ar IDROLEACTOR string = ACCOUNTSERVICER inner join dbo.ACTORROLE ar on(ar.IDA=tblmain.IDA)
INVOICINGOFFICE ar IDROLEACTOR string = INVOICINGOFFICE inner join dbo.ACTORROLE ar on(ar.IDA=tblmain.IDA)
ISSUER ar IDROLEACTOR string = ISSUER inner join dbo.ACTORROLE ar on(ar.IDA=tblmain.IDA)
left outer join (select IDA from dbo.ACTOR where exists (select 1 from dbo.ACTORROLE where IDA=ACTOR.IDA and IDROLEACTOR = 'ENTITY')) arENTITY on arENTITY.IDA=tblmain.IDA left outer join (select IDA from dbo.ACTOR where exists (select 1 from dbo.ACTORROLE where IDA=ACTOR.IDA and IDROLEACTOR = 'DESK')) arDESK on arDESK.IDA=tblmain.IDA left outer join (select IDA from dbo.ACTOR where exists (select 1 from dbo.ACTORROLE where IDA=ACTOR.IDA and IDROLEACTOR = 'DEPARTMENT')) arDEPT on arDEPT.IDA=tblmain.IDA left outer join (select IDA from dbo.ACTOR where exists (select 1 from dbo.ACTORROLE where IDA=ACTOR.IDA and IDROLEACTOR = 'CLIENT')) arCLIENT on arCLIENT.IDA=tblmain.IDA left outer join (select IDA from dbo.ACTOR where exists (select 1 from dbo.ACTORROLE where IDA=ACTOR.IDA and IDROLEACTOR = 'CORRESPONDENT')) arCORR on arCORR.IDA=tblmain.IDA left outer join (select IDA from dbo.ACTOR where exists (select 1 from dbo.ACTORROLE where IDA=ACTOR.IDA and IDROLEACTOR = 'BROKER')) arBROKER on arBROKER.IDA=tblmain.IDA left outer join (select IDA from dbo.ACTOR where exists (select 1 from dbo.ACTORROLE where IDA=ACTOR.IDA and IDROLEACTOR = 'CSS')) arCSS on arCSS.IDA=tblmain.IDA left outer join (select IDA from dbo.ACTOR where exists (select 1 from dbo.ACTORROLE where IDA=ACTOR.IDA and IDROLEACTOR in ('CLEARER','CCLEARINGCOMPART','HCLEARINGCOMPART','MCLEARINGCOMPART'))) arCLR on arCLR.IDA=tblmain.IDA left outer join (select IDA from dbo.ACTOR where exists (select 1 from dbo.ACTORROLE where IDA=ACTOR.IDA and IDROLEACTOR = 'CUSTODIAN')) arCUS on arCUS.IDA=tblmain.IDA left outer join (select IDA from dbo.ACTOR where exists (select 1 from dbo.ACTORROLE where IDA=ACTOR.IDA and IDROLEACTOR = 'TRADER')) arTRADER on arTRADER.IDA=tblmain.IDA left outer join (select IDA from dbo.ACTOR where exists (select 1 from dbo.ACTORROLE where IDA=ACTOR.IDA and IDROLEACTOR = 'SALES')) arSALE on arSALE.IDA=tblmain.IDA left outer join (select IDA from dbo.ACTOR where exists (select 1 from dbo.ACTORROLE where IDA=ACTOR.IDA and IDROLEACTOR = 'SYSADMIN')) arSYSADMIN on arSYSADMIN.IDA=tblmain.IDA left outer join (select IDA from dbo.ACTOR where exists (select 1 from dbo.ACTORROLE where IDA=ACTOR.IDA and IDROLEACTOR in ('USER','GUEST','SYSADMIN','SYSOPER'))) arUSER on arUSER.IDA=tblmain.IDA
case tblmain.IDA when arENTITY.IDA then 'sort:1;color:#C94300;font-weight:bold;background-color:#f9d3a6' when arCLIENT.IDA then 'sort:4;color:#003082;background-color:#b8d4e9' when arDESK.IDA then 'sort:2;color:#C94300;' when arDEPT.IDA then 'sort:3;color:#C94300;' when arCSS.IDA then 'sort:7;color:#000000;' when arCLR.IDA then 'sort:5;color:#251401;' when arCUS.IDA then 'sort:7;color:#036AB5;' when arBROKER.IDA then 'sort:6;color:#00ADC3;' when arCORR.IDA then 'sort:8;color:#674275;' when arTRADER.IDA then 'sort:9;color:#491F00;' when arSALE.IDA then 'sort:A;color:#491F00;' when arSYSADMIN.IDA then 'sort:B;color:#AE0303;background-color:#f7b7b8' when arUSER.IDA then 'sort:C;color:#3A7810;' else 'sort:Z;' end
case tblmain.IDA when arENTITY.IDA then 'lstaw=name:entity;title:Entity' else '' end || '+' || case tblmain.IDA when arDESK.IDA then 'lstaw=name:desk;title:Desk' else '' end || '+' || case tblmain.IDA when arDEPT.IDA then 'lstaw=name:dept;title:Department' else '' end || '+' || case tblmain.IDA when arCLIENT.IDA then 'lstaw=name:client;title:Client' else '' end || '+' || case tblmain.IDA when arCSS.IDA then 'lstaw=name:css;title:Clearing or Settlement system' else '' end || '+' || case tblmain.IDA when arCLR.IDA then 'lstaw=name:clearer;title:Clearer (or Clearing compartment)' else '' end || '+' || case tblmain.IDA when arCUS.IDA then 'lstaw=name:custodian;title:Custodian' else '' end || '+' || case tblmain.IDA when arBROKER.IDA then 'lstaw=name:broker;title:Broker' else '' end || '+' || case tblmain.IDA when arCORR.IDA then 'lstaw=name:correspondant;title:Correspondent' else '' end || '+' || case tblmain.IDA when arTRADER.IDA then 'lstaw=name:trader;title:Trader' else '' end || '+' || case tblmain.IDA when arSALE.IDA then 'lstaw=name:sale;title:Sale' else '' end || '+' || case tblmain.IDA when arSYSADMIN.IDA then 'lstaw=name:admin;title:Administrator system' else case tblmain.IDA when arUSER.IDA then 'lstaw=name:user;title:User' else '' end end
